alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 2:24PM MDT until May 24 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... South central Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 224 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Walsenburg, or 24 miles east of Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Huerfano and south central Pueblo Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
